basics.name: Yuheng Zhu
basics.label: Ph.D. Student
basics.summary: Ph.D. student in Computer Science at North Carolina State University.

work.name: Qualcomm
work.summary: Built an agentic RAG-driven failure triage pipeline processing 10K+ IVI/ADAS tests per day, blending LLM log summarization with LangChain, ChromaDB, and FAISS to deliver structured diagnostics for the Automotive IVI/ADAS team.

work.name: North Carolina State University
work.summary: Designed evidence-preserving perception middleware for autonomous driving, pairing JPEG and H.264 pipelines with NVENC/NVDEC acceleration and V4L2 capture while advancing trustworthy active-learning research for edge autonomy.

work.name: Southern University of Science and Technology
work.summary: Engineered a Carla-based remote simulation platform with an HTTP streaming backend for ROS sensor data, enabling multi-codec delivery and cutting remote driving latency from seconds to 50 ms using Python Flask, FFmpeg, and Docker.

work.name: JD.com â€” Jingdong AI Research Center
work.summary: Implemented Java-based automated testing atop the JD JSF RPC framework for the Jingxiaozhi AI customer service system, reaching 100% API coverage and informing NLP feature deployments across two production cycles.

education.notes: Expected completion in 2029; advised by Dr. Man-Ki Yoon.

education.institution: Southern University of Science and Technology

awards.summary: A Fisheye Camera-Based Large Construction Vehicle Blind-spot Warning System

awards.summary: Meritorious Prize in the international MCM competition.
